line_2: Have tempted me to break those Vows.

line_1: If Reason checks, or Duty disallows,
line_2: "Reason, you cry, and Duty are my Foes:

line_1: Thy longer stay the goddess disallows,
line_2: A wand, and roses bind his snowy brows:

line_1: Thy longer stay the goddess disallows,
line_2: Fly, nor her fiercer wrath too daringly arouse! "
